testcase.classname: Create a test fot purchase products - TestMe app
testcase.name: Purchase products in TestMe App
testcase.system-out: * user login in the TestMe app..............................................passed * user enters head in the search box........................................passed * user clicks on find details...............................................passed * user clicks on add to cart, cart icon, check out, proceed to pay.........passed * user select bank and click on continue....................................passed * user enters username and password.........................................passed * user enters trans password................................................passed * user clicks on pay now....................................................passed

testcase.classname: create test for registration - TestMe App
testcase.name: Registration test

testcase.classname: Moves to cart without adding to cart
testcase.name: The one where user moves to cart without adding any item in it
testcase.system-out: * Alex has registered to TestMe.............................................passed * Alex searches for particular product like headphones......................passed * Try to proceed to payment without adding any item in the cart.............passed * TestMe doesn't display the cart icon......................................passed
